articles.description: Ace India shooter Saurabh Chaudhary beat Micheal Schwald of Germany 16-6 in the gold medal match of the 10m air pistol shooting event at the ISSF World Cup in Cairo, Egypt on Tuesday. Chaudhary was in sublime form throughout the final, and won eight of 11 sin…
articles.content: In the qualifying round, Saurabh had finished third with a total of 584 points. He then went on to top the semi-fiinal with 38 points. Other Indians in the event, Gaurav Rana, Pradhyumn Singh and Ked… [+57 chars]

articles.title: Rohit Sharma Posts A Series Of Bizzare Tweets; Yuzvendra Chahal And Harsha Bhogle React - Cricfit
articles.description: A series of bizzare tweets from Indian skipper Rohit Sharma on Tuesday left the fans in a state of confusion.
articles.content: A series of bizzare tweets from Indian skipper Rohit Sharma on Tuesday left the fans in confusion. The content of those Tweets was very weird and it wasn’t anything Rohit generally does. There were s… [+2337 chars]

articles.title: WWC warm-ups: West Indies no match for all-round India, Devine-Kerr-Bates show overpowers Australia - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Smriti Mandhana leads Indian batting effort again, just two days after retiring hurt when she was struck by a Shabnim Ismail bouncer
